synopsis.text: Time to dive into a refreshing bathing experience with Hinako and her new companion, Hiyoko! In this anime, the duo guides viewers through the perfect bath routine, complete with splashing, stretching, and indulging in a variety of bath products. To make the experience even more accessible, a microSD card containing the OVA data is included with the DVD, allowing you to enjoy the anime right from your cell phone. Prepare for a soothing and entertaining journey that will leave you eager to implement Hinako and Hiyoko's bath time tips into your own routine!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
